info.title: Social Networking Platform API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Social Networking Platform.

get.summary: Get all comments by post ID
get.description: Retrieve all comments for a specific post.

post.description: Create a new comment on a post.

put.description: Update a specific comment by ID.

delete.description: Delete a specific comment by ID.

post.description: Send a friend request to another user.

parameters.name: friendId
parameters.description: ID of the user to send a friend request to

post.description: Accept a pending friend request from another user.

parameters.name: friendId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose friend request is accepted

post.description: Reject a pending friend request from another user.

parameters.name: friendId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose friend request is rejected

get.description: Retrieve a list of all the friends of the authenticated user.
Retrieve a list of all pending friend requests for the authenticated user.

post.description: Toggle a like or unlike for a post by the authenticated user. Returns a message indicating whether the post was liked or unliked.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to like/unlike

get.description: Returns a list of all posts

post.description: Create a new post with content and image

get.description: Retrieve a single post by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the post to retrieve

put.description: Update the content or image of an existing post

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the post to update

delete.description: Delete a post by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the post to delete

post.description: Logs in a user and returns a bearer token
Logs out the authenticated user and invalidates the access token
Registers a new user with name, email, password, and profile picture

user_id.description: The ID of the user who sent the request

friend_id.description: The ID of the user who received the request

status.description: The status of the friendship request

created_at.description: Timestamp when the friendship request was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the friendship request was last updated
